topic.title: Sample: Concept map
topic.shortdesc: This sample shows a concept hierarchy that supports a task flow. It can be found with accompanying content in samples/typedmaps/source/concepts.ditamap

body.codeblock: <map title="Concept maps"> <topicref navtitle="Maps" href="concepts/maps.dita"> <topicref navtitle="Topic references" href="concepts/topicrefs.dita"> <topicref navtitle="Titles and descriptions" href="concepts/titledesc.dita"> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Scope" href="concepts/scope.dita"/> <topicref navtitle="Format" href="concepts/format.dita"/> <topicref navtitle="Nested references" href="concepts/nesting.dita"/> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Collection types" href="concepts/colltype.dita"> <topicref navtitle="Sequences" href="concepts/sequences.dita"/> <topicref navtitle="Families" href="concepts/families.dita"/> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Map output" href="concepts/mapout.dita"/><?Pub Caret1?> </topicref> </map>
